titleStmt.title: Ḥabb ir-Rumān: a Ghoul-Story
TUNOCENT Dataset
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 31647

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

availability.p: The audio can be used by anyone honoring the specified license.

media.desc: The informant has agreed to the publication of the audio recording.
This is the compressed distribution copy of the recording for production use.

analytic.title: The Dialect Spoken in Sidi Bouzid: A Ghoul-Story from Central Tunisia.

biblStruct.note: This contribution centers around a ghoul-story related by a female speaker from the town of Sidi Bouzid in Central Tunisia. The story is transcribed, translated and provided with notes where necessary. Based on the speaker’s story, the main phonological and morphological features of the Sidi Bouzid dialect are described and provided with examples. As hitherto no texts have been published from this region, this contribution is a valuable insight into a Central Tunisian Bedouin-type dialect.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the TUNOCENT teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the arche prefix are pointers to resources archived in the long-term repository ARCHE.
Private URIs using the assets prefix are pointers to assets used by the TUNOCENT web application.
Private URIs using the datatypes.vicav.fl prefix are pointers to feature lists.
Private URIs using the datatypes.vicav.st prefix are pointers to VICAV sample texts.
Private URIs using the datatypes.tunocent.ums prefix are pointers to transcribed texts of unmonitored speech.
Private URIs using the datatypes.tunocent.pp prefix are pointers to TUNOCENT place profiles.
